title: Credit card spends jump 30 per cent in January
description: Reserve Bank of India (RBI) data showed that credit card transactions increased to Rs 1.7 lakh crore in January from Rs 1.3 lakh crore a year ago. In volume terms, the increase was 26%, to 330 million from 260 million, during this period.
